name: Espresso
description: A strong and bold coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee with a perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk, and foam.

name: Latte
description: A creamy coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a layer of foam.

name: Iced Coffee
description: A refreshing coffee brewed and chilled, served over ice.

name: Mocha
description: A delicious blend of espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream.

name: Cold Brew
description: A smooth and less acidic coffee made by steeping coarse coffee grounds in cold water for hours.

name: Americano
description: A diluted espresso offering a simple, robust flavor for coffee purists.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: A layered drink with espresso, steamed milk, vanilla syrup, and caramel drizzle.

name: Affogato
description: A decadent dessert-coffee made by pouring hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Frappuccino
description: A blended iced coffee with flavors and toppings like whipped cream.
